chara.textHome:
The name's Aimi Eri!
Great to meet you all!

Ack! Oh nooo!
I-is he...looking this way?!
Oh no, what should I do...what do I do?

Uhhh! Um, m-my hobbies, yeah, uh...
well, fantasizing...is NOT my hobby!
Obviously! Um, I make sweets...
I'm looking for someone to give them to...

Right now, I feel like I could take on any
rival that challenges me for his heart!

Like in manga, y'know? There's always
some character that tries to get in between
the main character and their love interest.
Ugh, I HATE those characters!
No, I won't stand for it!

There's no limits when it comes to love!
It's never ending!

Phew, what a relief!
All my love troubles...
haven't been fixed at all?!
Yow!
A sudden rush of heartache...
Why does love gotta hurt so much?!

But I guess that's part of the
superb charm of love...
I better enjoy it to the fullest!

I worry and worry about it, but I just don't
know what to do about these feelings!

I guess I'll keep worrying anyway.
Like what if he ends up
not liking me down the line...

But I made up my mind to see these
feelings through!
I've been waiting for you!
I was starting to feel really lonely, you know!

I need some love advice!
Could you help me out?
I'm sleepy, but I gotta pull myself together!

I love people who can say, "Good morning!"
all cheerfully bright and early in the morning.
It's like they're in a commercial or something!

I'm hungry... I could really go for
a huge plate of BBQ right now...

But, I wouldn't look very attractive
eating that, huh?
Maybe I'll just go for a sandwich instead...

Hey, let's go to a cafe!
We can swap love stories!

Don't worry, I promise it'll be fun!
I never run out of things to talk about!

I hate the nighttime,
even my thoughts get darker.

Like, I worry he doesn't really
like me, or that he'll reject me...

Once I get started thinking like that,
I can't stop.

When I'm talking with my friends,
I can really be myself.
I'm all cheerful and collected...

I wish I could be like that when
I'm talking to him...
Okay! Okay, I'm ready!

My main mission is love!
That's why I need to get all this
Magical Girl work done ASAP!
Come on, let's go already!

No matter who or what blocks my path, 
I won't let it get in the way of my love!

I'm not messing around!
I'll show them all the true power of love!
Have you heard of "love cosmetics"?

They say using them will get
your crush to love you back!

Do you think that's really true?
I've actually heard guys prefer
a more natural look...
"Aimi... I've always loved you too..."

Oh my gosh, what if he
said something like that?!
Oh my god! What should I do?!

I mean, sometimes I fantasize about
spending time with the person I like.

That's normal...isn't it?
Everyone does that, right?
I should change my look to get his attention!

You know, I've actually thought about
doing something like that before...

But I always get so scared it
won't work, so I never do it...

The boy I like is super, super hot!
For real! It's crazy!

It's like he jumped straight
out of some romance novel!
I love girl talk!

Nothing's more fun than
going crazy over love stories!

One of the awesome things about
being a Magical Girl is all the new
friends I've made that I can talk to!

My friends say I'm over the top, and that
I'm more bearable when I'm feeling shy.
Am I really that bad?
I'm not good at talking to boys...
It's not like I hate them or anything.
It just makes me nervous, you know?
"I want to know how he feels!"

That's what I wished for and that's
how I became a Magical Girl!

So what was the answer?
*Giggle* *GIGGLE*
Hey! Get outta my way!
Alright, see you around!
I can't keep my beloved waiting!
Can you feel the power of a woman in love?
Life's short! So go fall in love, girls!
Oh, me? I'm Aimi Eri!

I know this is sudden, but do you want
to hear about my love troubles?
I'm in SO deep, you won't believe it!
Hm? Oh, I got stronger?
Does that make me more attractive?
Yay!
I'm on top of the world!

It makes me wanna rush
right out and find love!
I'm just getting better and better!
Wooo! C'mon, girl, let's do this!
Aw yeah, that's good stuff!

I gotta aim at his heart while
I'm on this winning streak!
Pow, pow! Hee hee...
No, no! Just kidding!

There! I've come up with the perfect plan
for a fabulous, heart-throbbing date!

Now I gotta write it down in
my notebook so I don't forget!
